means: 鹦鹉，讲究穿着的人，花花公子

sentence.Network_en: You never called me an arrogant, reckless popinjay.
sentence.Network_cn: 你从没叫过我傲慢无知的花花公子.

sentence.Network_en: The preening popinjay has now departed the scene and good riddance, say I.
sentence.Network_cn: 那只得益洋洋的鹦鹉,现在终于滚蛋了,拔了咱的眼中钉,肉中刺, 这就是我说的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 第22条军规 Catch-22（人物篇） ... Major Metcalf 梅特卡夫少校 Popinjay 波平杰 Lieutenant Coombs 库姆斯少尉.
波平杰伊（popinjay），意即“自负者”。英国剧作家乔治•埃思里奇爵士（约1635一约1692）的喜剧《摩登人物》（1676）中的主角名 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French papingay, via Spanish from Arabic babbagā. The change in the ending was due to association with jay

means.word_mean: 1. a vain and talkative person (chatters like a parrot)
